comments.body: for this kind of comparisons, [`compare`](https://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/string/basic_string/compare) is much faster than `find` (see [quickbench](http://quick-bench.com/12JhTsiOrAQ6XmAtXqLTJ5qmOZs))

Nice @stwunsch ! Can you add another line to the comment giving an example of when that can happen (basically, the cppyy case you described in the previous commit). Also I would add an extra line between this comment and the first two comment lines in the method.
